title: Laura Crane
deck: My name is Laura Crane, I am the Youth Team Leader here at Gateway Church. I am married to the amazing Pete Crane and we have two gorgeous little children called Joel and Hope. We moved to York from London in August 2016; in London I worked for a Christian organisation called Youth for Christ. One of the things I love most about the youth at Gateway is First Friday Food, where once a month we cook and eat a meal together, as it combines two of the things I enjoy the most - food and chatting!
